ssot__SurveyVersion__dlm.name: Survey Version
ssot__SurveyVersion__dlm.description: The Survey Version DMO represents a version of a survey.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the survey version.

ssot__Last ModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the survey version.

ssot__SurveyId__c.description: A reference ID to the survey for the version.

ssot__SurveyStatus__c.description: A status of the survey version.

ssot__SurveySubjectId__c.description: A reference ID to the subject for the survey subject.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the survey version DMO.

ssot__VersionNumber__c.description: A version number of the survey version.
